review_body: I am coming from Mavic Air 1, so the jump is super huge, the noise from the drone is so much lesser than I was expecting and the camera is HUGE. The quality is great! Excited to shoot a lot more with this drone

This drone is not ready for sale. None of the features are available to use until next year! Why did they release a drone that cannot be used for its intended purposes? Will give this a try until January but this is a great disappointment.

Have done some testing and there is a noticeable difference in quality at night. Overall it looks closer to a full frame camera with brighter shots in video, more detail and less noise. USB C charging is awesome that they added that.
The quality of the product and footage / photos is out of this world. For a consumer-level product DJI never ceases to amaze. 10 out of 5.

Bought the CINE version because at the time of this review Fly more combo was $3,950.00 quite high considering it was only $3,600.00 a few days ago. For extra $2000 the cine version seemed like a better deal with the RC Pro remote and 1TB onboard SSD since I would have purchased the remote separately anyway.

The DJI Mavic 3 cine pro is absolutely amazing in every way. The two most important things about this drone are the flying ability of the aircraft and the ultra high-res images it can capture. It's also easy to use. I suggest getting the full deluxe combo package for it.
